record.description: Ida Noyes Hall, University of Chicago Physical Education class. Students, both men and women participate in physical education as a requirement for the first two years of the College. Emphasis of the College sports program is on participation in sports that can be continued after graduation. The survey course in sports does meet the needs of the ninety-nine percent of participants in a very satisfactory way.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Pr stamps, Chicago Daily News caption, attached caption
